FuncDef: This command configures the PTP asymmetry delay delta on an Ethernet port. The command corrects for known asymmetry for time of day or phase recovery of PTP packets on both local and downstream PTP clocks.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the value, in nanoseconds, that the forward path delay varies from the mean path delay; the value can be a negative number. Values--2147483648 to 2147483647.
